meanings.definition: Pooves (noun): a slang term for a homosexual man
meanings.sent1: He is proud to be one of the pooves in our community.
meanings.sent2: The group of pooves gathered to celebrate Pride Month.
meanings.sent3: The pooves at the party had the best dance moves.
meanings.sent4: His colorful outfits make him stand out like a pooves in a crowd.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed a heartwarming story of a young pooves finding acceptance.

meanings.definition: Pooves (verb): to act in a flamboyant or effeminate manner
meanings.sent1: She pooves around the room with grace and style.
meanings.sent2: The actor pooves on stage, captivating the audience with every move.
meanings.sent3: He pooves his way through life, spreading joy wherever he goes.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter pooves through the air like a melody.
meanings.sent5: The flowers pooves in the gentle breeze, swaying elegantly in the sunlight.
